title: Boku no Jealousy Monogatari.
sinopse:
Haru, a girl who is scared of boys, encounters a beautiful girl that took her breath away. Who would have thought that she would meet her again in her new high school.

(Source: MU)

Included one-shots:
Volume 2: Psycho*Love*Triangle
Volume 3: Chotto, Warui, Toshishita no.
